title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and list models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; simple API to chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama; use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider in LangChain apps.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’); chat interface, model management, RAG, multi-user.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API for chat, generate, pull, list, delete, and embedding operations.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API; generate, chat, pull, and list models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenience wrapper CLI around the Ollama daemon; quick model switching, prompt templates, shell pipes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying Ollama with Docker, Kubernetes, GPU stacks, and sample apps.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for running Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for Ollama; one-command local LLM server.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama; reproducible builds on NixOS with optional CUDA.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, and manage models from Go programs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model; slash commands, thread support, rate limits.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama; DM or mention the bot to chat with local LLMs.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CUE) module to spin up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles and quantization recipes for Ollama.
